title: PyQA Strategy Definition
description: Schema describing reusable execution, parsing, and utility strategies for catalog-driven tools.

schemaVersion.description: Semantic version for the strategy schema.

id.description: Unique identifier that tool definitions reference.

type.description: High level capability provided by the strategy.

description.description: Human readable explanation of the strategy purpose.

implementation.description: Fully qualified Python import path to the strategy callable or factory.

entry.description: Optional attribute name on the imported module/object when not using the module level symbol.

config.description: Describes required and optional configuration keys consumed by the strategy.
